column4: description
Coursing with electrical energy, this magical axe has been struck by lightning.
The wielder of this axe is emboldened and will attack twice when initiating combat.
After being completely consumed, any axe becomes this. They are still usable, but their low accuracy and might, coupled with a considerable increase of weight, render them useless.
A diabolical axe that inflicts damage after combat.
This hammer can pummel metal with astonishing force, making it effective against armored units.
A compact ranged axe that can be thrown at distant enemies.
An Empire Wyvern Corps axe, wielded in the War Of Heroes.
A standard axe made of iron--simple but effective.
Deadly sharp, this axe boasts a high critical-hit rate.
A bludgeoning weapon that can ravage armor, this mace is effective against armored units.
Can be forged into an Iron, Steel, Silver or Brave Axe or Hauteclere.
The light construction of this ranged axe makes it easy to throw at foes from afar.
An axe crafted from shining silver.
A weighty steel axe that deals significant blows.
The wielder of this brutal ranged axe can hurl it at enemies for deep impact.
This simple axe is perfect for training purposes.
Sacred Weapon (Crest of Gloucester) that restores HP every turn.
An axe that poisons foes.
An impressive axe forged by the legendary artisan Zoltan.
